examples.example: 周末的时候，我喜欢和家人一起去郊外享受美好的大自然。

translate.english: On weekends, I like to go to the suburbs with my family to enjoy the beautiful nature.

examples.example: 每到周末，我都会和朋友们一起去做一些有意义的公益活动。

translate.english: Every weekend, I will go to do some meaningful public welfare activities with my friends.

examples.example: 周末我们一家人会围坐在一起，愉快地分享这一周的趣事。

translate.english: On weekends, our family will sit around and happily share the interesting things of this week.
